title: Heroes of the restoration
description: Mormon Book about Joseph Smith, Oliver Cowdery, Orson Hyde, Heber C. Kimball, Edward Partridge, Martin Harris, David W. Patten, Orson Pratt, Parley P. Pratt, Willard Richards, George A. Smith, Hyrum Smith, Samuel Harrison Smith, Lorenzo Snow, John Taylor, Newel K. Whitney, Wilford Woodruff and Brigham Young.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley
